note.p: Career: Huguenot; Secretary to the General Assembly of the French Churches in London; Tutor to Winwood Montagu, Lord Mounthermer; naturalised British (1696); travelled to The Hague and Aix-la-Chapelle (1698-1699); Governor of the Hospital for Poor French Protestants, London (1728)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Shaw LD
Notes: On PL for 1729 and not after. Hunter says that he was admitted on the date given above, 18 Dec 1695.
